jobs.name: Sr Site Reliability Engineer
jobs.description:
Au sein de l’équipe Tech composée d’une vingtaine de personnes, tu seras garant(e) de la stabilité et la scalabilité de l’infrastructure de tous nos produits ! C’est un poste essentiel pour le bon déroulement de tous nos futurs développements !

Beaucoup de choses ont déjà été mises en place par la squad Ops:

  • CI/CD via Circle CI
  • Gestion de l’infrastructure via AWS
  • Monitoring de notre flotte avec Datadog
  • Automatisation d’une partie de nos workflows
  • Tests de sécurité via Bug Bounties

On a également la chance d’avoir une communauté très réactive qui n’hésite pas à nous signaler le moindre problème rencontré en production.

Dans ce contexte, tu seras responsable de :

  • La mise en place d’infrastructures répondant aux besoin des différentes équipes,
  • Poursuivre l’automatisation de nos workflows,
  • Gagner en vélocité en instaurant l’utilisation de Kubernetes / Docker,
  • Contribuer à la mise en place de bonnes pratiques en termes de sécurité

Pour en savoir plus sur notre équipe Tech, composée aujourd’hui d’une 40aine de personnes, tu peux consulter :

  • Les [vidéos] de différentes personnes de l’équipe
  • La page Tech de notre profil WTTJ
  • Quelques articles rédigés par des membres de l’équipe Tech

Onboarding

  • En plus de l’onboarding que chaque nouvel entrant va suivre (qui consiste à découvrir l’ensemble de nos métiers via des immersions), un programme de formation sur mesure est prévu par l’équipe Welcome to the Jungle.
  • Ce que nous te garantissons de trouver chez Welcome to the Jungle
  • Un projet ambitieux dans le secteur du recrutement et de la marque employeur… et des idées à la pelle pour le faire grandir !
  • Une équipe de 140+ personnes soudées, enthousiastes et passionnées pour faire construire et faire grandir notre projet
  • Des compétences extrêmement variées (production vidéo, tech, content,… ) et donc un environnement de travail riche et stimulant
  • De nombreux event internes : Jungle Party, Jungle Talks, Conférences,…

Si tu souhaites faire du remote ou aller travailler en espace de co-working régulièrement ce n’est pas un problème. Le principal étant que chacun puisse avancer dans les meilleures conditions.

Tu souhaites en savoir plus sur l’équipe Tech ?

  • La culture d’entreprise chez Welcome to the Jungle
  • Interview de Kevin, CTO
jobs.profile:
Il n’y a pas de profil type chez Welcome to the Jungle, nous venons tous d’horizons différents et c’est ce qui fait notre force !

Nous t’invitons à postuler si tu disposes de solides connaissances réseau et système Unix, que tu disposes d’une première expérience en qualité de DevOps et si :

  • Tu portes une attention toute particulière aux détails et tu es (très) organisé(e),
  • Tu es amoureux(se) de l’Infrastructure as code (IaC) et as déjà utilisé intensivement AWS
  • L’automatisation est un leitmotiv dans ton quotidien,
  • Tu as de bonnes connaissances en CI/CD et ne laisses aucune machine sans surveillance,
  • Tu es à l’aise avec le shell/python scripting,
  • Gros plus si tu es familier avec l’une des technos suivantes : terraform, docker, kubernetes, helm, GNU/Linux, python/Go, shell usage, shell scripting, Redit, PostgreSQL.

Mais avant tout, communiquer et partager sont essentiels pour toi :)
Les diplômes nous importent peu, on recherche un(e) passionné(e), un(e) acharné(e) de veille et surtout quelqu’un qui sait nous parler de ses sujets avec passion !
Aussi, l’équipe étant encore relativement petite, on reste très ouverts aux initiatives comme le choix des technos, des outils, etc. C’est donc le bon moment pour nous rejoindre et apprendre un maximum de choses avec nous.

Welcome to the Jungle aspire à avoir un impact social positif, et prête une attention particulière au fait de respecter la diversité, l'inclusion et l’équité. Chaque candidature sera traitée de manière équitable et se basera sur les compétences et les motivations de chacun.
jobs.recruitment_process:
Le CV n’est pas obligatoire si ton profil LinkedIn est à jour.

  • Etape 1: Call de 45min avec Eva (https://www.linkedin.com/in/eva-tello/)
  • Etape 2 Test technique
  • Etape 3: Rencontres avec les opérationnels

jobs.name: Product Domain Director
jobs.description:
Job Scope :

As part of our company strategy, we are building a portfolio of products that aim to transform the experience at work. We want to help companies build trusting work relationships, foster workplace connections and inspire every employee to work for more.
To help us go further in this strategy, we are looking for a Product Director that will take the lead on our main Product Domain composed of: the media platform, our company profile offering and the candidate tracking system application.

Main Responsibilities :

  • Reporting directly to the CPO, you will manage a team of 3 Product Managers with the following responsibilities:
  • Oversee the entire product lifecycle for our 3 main offerings
  • Develop and define the Product Domain tactic and strategy with your team and the corresponding squads in alignment with the company strategy.
  • Drive transversal and impactful product initiatives that can alter the business trajectory with a clear ROI in the mid term
  • Motivate and achieve continuous improvement for your team as well as other Product Managers around you
  • Collaborate with the Engineering, Design, Product Marketing, Marketing, Business and Media leaders in order to ensure that the business and customer satisfaction goals are met
  • Define and monitor the relevant KPIs for your suite of products and for your team
  • Represent the product domain strategy in front of internal or external Stakeholders
jobs.profile:
We are looking for a talented Product Leader with the following criteria:

  • A proven experience in leading and managing a product management team, within a SaaS company
  • Passionate about building world class SaaS products
  • Eager to make their team grow in their career and improve their skills
  • Showing a great sensibility for Design & User experience in all things. In general, WTTJ puts a lot of attention on building well designed and attractive interfaces
  • Excellent communication skills in English and French (both speaking and writing) to collaborate and manage product stakeholders from various departments
  • Data-driven and analytical mindset
  • Advanced knowledge of agile methodologies and product practices
jobs.recruitment_process:
The CV is not mandatory if your LinkedIn profile is up to date.

  • Step 1: 45min call with Eva (https://www.linkedin.com/in/eva-tello/)
  • Step 2: Interview with Benjamin Cadars, CPO
  • Step 3: Test Case
  • Step 4: Interview with Kevin Leroy, CTO
  • Step 5: Interview with Jeremy Cledat, CEO

jobs.name: Market & Customer Strategy Intern
jobs.description:
Au sein de notre équipe Marketing, sous la responsabilité de Raphaël, Senior Product Marketing Manager, et en relation continue avec les équipes Stratégie, Data, Produit et Business, tu contribueras à poser les fondations de notre Market Intelligence chez Welcome to the Jungle.

Concrètement, cela signifie nous aider à améliorer la connaissance que l'on a de nos marchés (concurrence, partenaires potentiels, écosystème) et de nos clients (candidats, lecteurs, clients B2B). C'est un rôle transverse et stratégique passionnant qui nécessite organisation, capacité d'analyse et de synthèse ainsi qu'une aisance pour restituer des idées et informations tant à l'oral qu'à l'écrit.

Ta mission s’articulera principalement autour de 4 axes :

  1. IDENTIFICATION DES SUJETS STRATEGIQUES : En ligne avec les objectifs de Welcome to the Jungle, tu échangeras avec les équipes Produit, Stratégie, Business et Marketing pour identifier les données et analyses existantes et leurs besoins.

  2. PRIORISATION : Tu détermineras avec ta/ton responsable les sujets à traiter en priorité et tu définiras la meilleure manière de traiter ces besoins : mener des analyses et études par nous-mêmes, acheter des rapports existants, nous faire accompagner par les instituts etc.

  3. ANALYSE, DATA ANALYSE & ENTRETIENS CLIENTS : Tu auras ensuite en charge la production des analyses demandées (analyse de marché, monographie des concurrents, feedback client etc.) ce qui requiert de solides capacités d'analyse et de synthèse ainsi qu'une affinité avec la prise de hauteur stratégique. Par exemple quel est le parcours utilisateur d'un candidat en recherche d'un stage en France ? Quels sont les concurrents US sur le marché des ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems)

4.** PARTAGE DES CONNAISSANCES / SALES ENABLEMENT** :Tu contribueras enfin à la restitution des informations clefs via des présentations écrites et/ou orales pour épauler les équipes business ou produit (affinement des Buyers Personas, User Journeys, Battle cards etc.)
jobs.profile:
Il n’y a pas de profil type chez Welcome to the Jungle, nous venons tous d’horizons différents et c’est ce qui fait notre force ! Nous t’invitons à postuler si tu es motivé(e) et intéressé(e) par les médias et par le secteur de l’emploi de manière générale et si :

  • Tu disposes d’un esprit analytique : tu es capable de fusionner de nombreuses sources de données et d'en comprendre les enseignements majeurs
  • Tu arrives à synthétiser de nombreuses sources d'informations en des livrables clairs et impactants pour les équipes
  • Tu es curieux(se) et débrouillard(e) : tu peux te prendre d’intérêt pour tout type de sujet et en comprendre très vite les différents enjeux
  • Tu n’as pas peur de gérer plusieurs projets de front et tu sais t’organiser
  • Tu aimes trouver des solutions : tu sais faire preuve d’initiative pour ne pas rester bloqué(e)

Welcome to the Jungle aspire à avoir un impact social positif, et prête une attention particulière au fait de favoriser la diversité l’inclusion et l’équité au sein des équipes ainsi qu’au sein de sa communauté.

Ce que tu développeras chez nous :

  • La capacité à t'adapter à des interlocuteurs variés, tant du point de vue métier (produit, business, stratégie) que hiérarchique (comment restituer l'info à un CxO vs une personne opérationnelle)
  • La capacité à comprendre des marchés, à synthétiser des informations nombreuses pour isoler et partager efficacement ses éléments saillants.
  • La proactivité, l’autonomie et la rigueur dans l’organisation de tes missions
jobs.recruitment_process:
• Etape 1 : Echange visio de 45 minutes environ avec Marine, Head of Talent Acquisition et Laurène, Talent Acquisition intern.
  • Etape 2 : Si l'entretien est concluant, quelques questions préliminaires pour tester tes savoir-faire marketing te seront envoyées 60 minutes avant ton deuxième entretien
  • Etape 3 : Echange visio d'une heure avec Raphaël, Senior Product Marketing Manager et discussion sur les questions de préparation
  • Etape 4 : Echange visio avec Manon, Chief of Staff

jobs.name: Customer Care Specialist
jobs.description:
As a talented and inspiring Care Agent Executive, you will join a 3-people team waiting for additional hands to handle & achieve a great mission : build a premium user experience.

Your main mission will be to ensure reactive and effective support to clients and users, coordinate with other teams (product, tech, operations) to solve problems, and facilitate the usage of our products (Welcome to the Jungle, Welcome Kit, Welcome Originals, and new ones launching soon).

Here’s a snapshot of your future missions:

  • Support: understand and manage inbound requests from clients and users and solve users and clients problems with practical solutions
  • Knowledge base content creation: create and organize the knowledge base for all the products and use cases, make propositions of new formats and optimization of existing ones.
  • Project management: make precise report of feedbacks and bugs to the Tech, Product and Marketing teams, and work together with them to implement new processes for constant improvement and search of excellence.
  • Reporting: Track the productivity and efficiency indicator of support, & participate in making them better & better.
jobs.profile:
At Welcome to the Jungle, we are all coming from (really) different backgrounds, that’s our main strength!

Our Care Agent Executive would be someone with:

  • Previous experience (2+ years) in customer support
  • Previous experience in a B2B SaaS company is a plus
  • Excellent organizational and project management skills
  • Great written skills both in French and English
  • Strong interest in SaS products: talking about software, data, and tech is music to your ears!

In addition, the Care Agent Executive would have to present the following qualities and mindset:

  • Empathy and care for others: helping people is something important for you, from Monday to Friday!
  • High level of energy and can-do attitude
  • Organized and structured
  • Able to coordinate and confederate different teams around key projects
  • Curious and resourceful: a reactive problem solver
  • Interest in employer branding & recruitment is a plus!

Welcome to the Jungle aspires to promote a positive social impact. Its mission includes paying particularly close attention to fostering diversity, inclusion and equality within teams as well as within its community.
jobs.recruitment_process:
Step 1 : phone call with Auriane
Step 2 : interview with Ilaria & Marianne, Customer Care Specialists
Step 3 : Interview with Antoine-Benjamin, our CMO
Step 4 : interview with Camille, our General Manager

jobs.name: Account Manager
jobs.description:
Within the Business team and more precisely within the Account Management team, you will manage, grow and nurture a portfolio of customers by being their privileged point of contact and ensuring their satisfaction.

Your objective is to deliver the best customer experience possible in order to reduce churn and maximise upsell and cross sell opportunities.

You are passionate about customer relationships , driven by helping and advising people, always answering problems with the best solution. You have a proven track record in handling volume and your are not afraid of tough negotiations. You are patient and resilient.

Reporting directly to the Team Lead Account Management, you will be responsible for :

  • Onboarding new customers : in coordination with other teams (mainly Production) and ensuring maximum product adoption at this stage thus maximum usage

  • Developing trustworthy relationships within your portfolio :
    -> by advising customers on the best use of our products
    -> by preparing & conducting meetings with clients, with small support of their manager
    -> by sharing Data and successful use-cases
    -> by becoming a partner over time on all employer branding topics thanks to a strong expertise
    -> by identifying needs and always proposing solutions that will bring more value to customers
    -> by anticipating and preventing potential dissatisfaction in order to reduce churn level

  • Identifying and pursuing growth opportunities through upsells and cross sells

  • Enhancing Welcome to the jungle products by sharing customers feedbacks in order to contribute to product developments and contributing to process improvements for the team's collective success
jobs.profile:
At Welcome to the Jungle, we are all coming from (really) different backgrounds, that’s our main strength!

You are our ideal profile if :

  • You ideally have 3 to 5 years experience in account management or business development
  • You like to understand needs, convince and sell
  • You like to find solutions and are able to use your initiative to solve a customer problem
  • You are organized, rigorous and responsive
  • Volume management is not a topic for you
  • You are fluent in French and have a good level of English

Welcome to the Jungle aspires to promote a positive social impact. Its mission includes paying particularly close attention to fostering diversity, inclusion and equality within teams as well as within its community.
jobs.recruitment_process:
• Step 1: Visio interview with Faustine (around 30 minutes)
  • Step 2 : Visio interview with Louise or Margot (around 45 minutes)
  • Step 3 : Visio interview with Chadia (around 45 minutes)
  • Step 4 : Visio interview with Camille (around 45 minutes)

jobs.name: Senior People Operations specialist
jobs.description:
In order to support and fuel our global expansion plans, we are scaling our People Operations Team and recruiting a Senior HR Data Analyst.

Reporting to our Senior HR BP, your mission will be to support our People team and internal stakeholders by leading and using key people data to enable better decision making processes.

You will be responsible for:

HR Data Analytics, Reporting & Solutions

  • Challenge your key internal partners (Comex & leadership team & HR BPs) in order to identify, calculate and maintain up-to-date key people KPIs,
  • Prepare monthly /quarterly reports
  • Analyzing people data in order to bring questioning, potential conclusions between topics
  • Maintaining the accurate data in our HRIS, including uploads, audits and data cleaning,
  • Participate in optimization of the existing and new HR tools,
  • Setting up processes and tools in order to collect data in a sustainable & long-term way,
  • Prepare ad-hoc analysis and simulations

Compensation & Benefits

  • Support our semi-annual compensation review process, alongside the Chief People Officer and HR Business Partners,
  • Build a comprehensive market intelligence for employee rewards in our different markets and contribute to our C&B policy construction,
  • Monitor the review practices on the local markets (France, Spain, Belgium and Czech Republic),

HR Budgeting

  • Build and monitor People budget,
  • Perform monthly budget variances analysis and initiate budgetary control actions

What can you expect ?

  • You will be working with different stakeholders, on key HR topics and projects,
  • You will build and deploy HR initiatives and solutions which will impact the People and leadership team decision making processes
  • You will work in a fast-paced environment which requires both proactivity and creativity
jobs.profile:
• You have 5+ years experience in a People Analytics role,
  • Excellent understanding of HR Processes (Core HR, Compensation, Performance, Recruitment, Talent Management, Learning & development, etc.),
  • You are data driven, and have problem solving skills,
  • You demonstrate extreme attention to detail,
  • You like to build processes and projects from scratch,
  • You are proactive in proposing and implementing new tools and solutions, in a fast-paced environment that requires innovation and creativity,
  • You speak both French and English fluently

Welcome to the Jungle aspires to promote a positive social impact. Its mission includes paying particularly close attention to fostering diversity, inclusion and equality within teams as well as within its community.
jobs.recruitment_process:
Step 1 : phone interview with Mathilde, Senior HR BP
Step 2 : interview with Marine, Head of TA
Step 3 : interview with Noëlla, Chief People Officer
Step 4 : interview with Camille, General Manager

jobs.name: Tech Talent Acquisition Manager
jobs.description:
In order to support and fuel our global expansion plans, we are growing our Talent Acquisition Team and recruiting a Tech Talent Acquisition Manager.

Reporting into the Head of Talent Acquisition, you will be responsible for end-to-end recruitment processes for our Tech & Product teams.

Your key responsibilities will include the following :

High-standards & candidate-focused recruitment process management

  • Sourcing diverse and experienced profiles through a variety of recruiting channels
  • Attracting your candidates through an insightful and rich conversation
  • Organizing high-bar and high quality interviews for your candidates
  • Ensuring the smoothest candidate experience along the way!

Supporting the CTO & the CPO in building an A-Team of tech talents

  • Assessing your candidates to select high-impact profiles
  • Stay on top of tech community trends

Business Partnership & Talent advisory

  • Building up internal and external market intelligence to actively contribute and advise our Tech & Product teams' scale
  • Reporting on your activity to give visibility to your internal clients
  • Managing and advising leaders with high expectations, acting as a real business partner and talent advisor.
  • Following up on your new hires onboarding and integrate feedback to continuously improve sourcing and recruitment effort

Ownership of key projects

  • Contribute to our employer brand development through innovative projects
  • Contribute to our recruitment process revamp & interviewers training
  • Develop a reporting culture to grow our hiring prediction capability and better identify process optimization opportunities
jobs.profile:
This job is made for you if:

  • You have 4+ years of experience in Talent Acquisition, ideally in a fast-growing, tech company
  • You are passionate about tech hiring and can demonstrate a strong career track in that field
  • You speak fluent English and French.
  • You thrive in fast-paced and metrics-driven environments
  • You have a strong sense of curiosity and a natural capacity to step outside of your comfort zone
  • You demonstrate excellent communication and influential skills
  • You are a recognized business partner and your hiring experience have proven instrumental to teams' growth & success
jobs.recruitment_process:
Your application will be reviewed within 5 business days.

If you enter the process, you will go through 3 steps :

  • Zoom interview with Marine, Head of Talent Acquisition
  • Zoom interview with Noella, Chief People Officer
  • Zoom interview with an Engineering Manager or our Chief Product Officer.
  • Zoom interview with Camille, General Manager

jobs.name: Communications Manager
jobs.description:
As a Communications Manager, and as part of the Brand and Communications team, you will be in charge of our PR & external communications strategy in France, aligned with our vision and business objectives.

EXTERNAL COMMUNICATIONS

  • You will develop in-depth knowledge of the market and competitive landscape, as well as key challenges, target audiences, and other factors that can impact our communications
  • In cooperation with the Brand and Communications team, you will help implement strategies to communicate our core brand message through our main communication channels
  • You will develop and write content to create compelling creative executions for a consistent brand message for our on and offline external communications
  • You will identify and manage our speaking opportunities, selecting the right spokesperson for each one of them, and coordinating the key messages and objectives
  • You will analyze the output of communication activities. Track results, monitor success and analyze our communication strategy KPIs

PRESS AND INFLUENCER RELATIONS

  • You will be responsible of building strong relationships with business, HR, and tech journalists and influencers in the markets where we operate
  • You will create compelling stories to pitch and share (data content, media stories...) to journalists to position WTTJ as the expert of work experience
  • You will manage media inquiries and interview requests, and prepare company spokespeople for media engagements
  • You will monitor industry trends as well as the competitive environment to identify speaking opportunities
  • If needed, you will partner with agencies and freelancers to reach our PR goals You will participate in the development of our external events
jobs.profile:
At Welcome to the Jungle, we are all coming from (really) different backgrounds, that’s our main strength!

You are our ideal profile if :

  • You have at least 5 years of experience in the communications field, B2B experience is a plus
  • You are fluent in French and English, both written and spoken
  • You have experience in an agency or you have already managed external agencies
  • You are able to develop structured, clear and compelling texts
  • You have excellent writing and communication skills
  • You are creative with analytical skills

Welcome to the Jungle aspires to promote a positive social impact. Its mission includes paying particularly close attention to fostering diversity, inclusion and equality within teams as well as within its community.

jobs.name: Cadreur - (Freelance Paris)
jobs.description:
Nous sommes à la recherche d'un cadreur/photographe pour aller à la rencontre de nos clients. Nous réalisons plusieurs dizaines de tournages chaque semaine à Paris.

Ce sont des tournages d'une durée d'environ 3H où il faut réaliser une série de photos et d'interviews au sein d'une entreprise.

Ces tournages sont primordiaux chez nous et nécessitent d'être autonome, attentif et de savoir mettre à l'aise les gens !

Ta mission principale sera de réaliser des tournages à la fois photos et vidéos chez nos entreprises partenaires.

Une fois le tournage effectué, il suffit de nous faire parvenir les rush. On s’occupe de la post-prod.

Tu as un statut d'auto-entrepreneur / freelance

Tu es organisé, rigoureux, ponctuel et souriant !

Afin de garantir une cohérence dans les contenus proposés à nos clients, merci de postuler UNIQUEMENT si vous êtes en possession de l'équipement suivant :

  • Canon R6
  • SONY A7S3 / A7R3
  • Lumix S5 / SH1
  • Fuji XT3
  • Objectifs 70-200mm / 24-105mm / 28mm
  • Micro cravate HF
  • Trépied
  • Panneaux led
